text_block_list.text: Hyaa!? Eh? Eh!? What is happening…?
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Woah! Everyone is laughing!! They look like they're 
having so much fun!! What is it? Did something funny 
happen!? I wanna hear about it too!
text_block_list.name: Haru Urara

text_block_list.text:
No, I don't believe that anything in particular 
happened… You see, El and Opera O-san both had 
solos during the live concert, didn't they?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Due to that fact, a debate began regarding who the real star of 
the show was. Was it the world's strongest, the century's 
greatest emperor, the top tier, or the class representative?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
…Status: Incomprehensible. No connection can be found between 
simultaneous laughter and the process of settling an argument.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I agree. They have been at it for 15 minutes now, you'd think 
they would have noticed that by now.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
…Plus, for us, when we say settle, 
there really is only one…
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Hmph… It seems that we 
will have to truly settle this matter.
text_block_list.name: TM Opera O

text_block_list.text: Hehe… You all really are a delight.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
